sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the AvailableAddOn resource.

friendly_name.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

description.description: A short description of the Add-on's functionality.

pricing_type.description: How customers are charged for using this Add-on.

configuration_schema.description: The JSON object with the configuration that must be provided when installing a given Add-on.

url.description: The absolute URL of the resource.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the AvailableAddOnExtension resource.

available_add_on_sid.description: The SID of the AvailableAddOn resource to which this extension applies.

friendly_name.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

product_name.description: The name of the Product this Extension is used within.

unique_name.description: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource.

url.description: The absolute URL of the resource.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the InstalledAddOn resource. This Sid can also be found in the Console on that specific Add-ons page as the 'Available Add-on Sid'.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the InstalledAddOn resource.

friendly_name.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

description.description: A short description of the Add-on's functionality.

configuration.description: The JSON object that represents the current configuration of installed Add-on.

unique_name.description: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the resource.

submitted.description: Whether this billable item was successfully submitted for billing.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the InstalledAddOn Extension resource.

installed_add_on_sid.description: The SID of the InstalledAddOn resource to which this extension applies.

friendly_name.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

product_name.description: The name of the Product this Extension is used within.

unique_name.description: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource.

enabled.description: Whether the Extension will be invoked.

url.description: The absolute URL of the resource.

total_submitted.description: Total amount in local currency that was billed in this request. Aggregates all billable_items that were successfully submitted.

quantity.description: Total amount in local currency that was billed for this Billing Item. Can be any floating number greater than 0.

submitted.description: Whether the billing event was successfully generated for this Billable Item.

description.description: A JSON object describing the module and is displayed under the Description tab of the Module detail page. You can define the main body of the description, highlight key features or aspects of the module and if applicable, provide code samples for developers

support.description: A JSON object containing information on how customers can obtain support for the module. Use this parameter to provide details such as contact information and support description.

policies.description: A JSON object describing the module's privacy and legal policies and is displayed under the Policies tab of the Module detail page. The maximum file size for Policies is 5MB

module_info.description: A JSON object containing essential attributes that define a module. This information is presented on the Module detail page in the Twilio Marketplace Catalog. You can pass the following attributes in the JSON object

documentation.description: A JSON object for providing comprehensive information, instructions, and resources related to the module

configuration.description: A JSON object for providing listing specific configuration. Contains button setup, notification url, among others.

pricing.description: A JSON object for providing Listing specific pricing information.

sid.description: The unique identifier for this resource.

account_sid.description: The account sid that owns this record.

net_revenue.description: Net revenue collected as part of this record.

filename.description: Name of the file attached to the record.

date_created.description: The date and time in UTC when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date and time in UTC when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the resource.

info.title: Twilio - Marketplace
info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.

get.description: Retrieve a list of Add-ons currently available to be installed.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

Access-Control-Allow-Origin.description: Specify the origin(s) allowed to access the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Methods.description: Specify the HTTP methods allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Headers.description: Specify the headers allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Credentials.description: Indicates whether the browser should include credentials

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the AvailableAddOn resource to fetch.

Access-Control-Allow-Methods.description: Specify the HTTP methods allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Credentials.description: Indicates whether the browser should include credentials

get.description: This endpoint returns the Listings owned by the authenticated Account.

Access-Control-Allow-Origin.description: Specify the origin(s) allowed to access the resource

post.description: This endpoint updates the data of a given Listing. To find a Listing's SID, use the [Available Add-ons resource](https://www.twilio.com/docs/marketplace/api/available-add-ons) or view its Listing details page in the Console by visiting the [Catalog](https://console.twilio.com/us1/develop/add-ons/catalog) or the [My Listings tab](https://console.twilio.com/us1/develop/add-ons/publish/my-listings) and selecting the Listing. Only Listing owners are allowed to update the Listing.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: SID that uniquely identifies the Listing.

buttons.label: Configurable button text
buttons.help_text: The button text, url, and help text are now configurable via self service

Access-Control-Allow-Origin.description: Specify the origin(s) allowed to access the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Methods.description: Specify the HTTP methods allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Headers.description: Specify the headers allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Credentials.description: Indicates whether the browser should include credentials

ModuleInfo.description: A JSON object containing essential attributes that define a Listing.

Description.description: A JSON object describing the Listing. You can define the main body of the description, highlight key features or aspects of the Listing, and provide code samples for developers if applicable.

Documentation.description: A JSON object for providing comprehensive information, instructions, and resources related to the Listing.

Policies.description: A JSON object describing the Listing's privacy and legal policies. The maximum file size for Policies is 5MB.

Support.description: A JSON object containing information on how Marketplace users can obtain support for the Listing. Use this parameter to provide details such as contact information and support description.

Configuration.description: A JSON object for providing Listing-specific configuration. Contains button setup, notification URL, and more.

Pricing.description: A JSON object for providing Listing's purchase options.

ModuleInfo.name: My Company Marketplace Listing
ModuleInfo.short_description: Short description on what the Company does.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of a Listing.
